an9.63:3.1: 63 Weaknesses in Training and Mindfulness Meditation
an9.63:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five weaknesses when you’re training.
an9.63:4.3: Killing living creatures, stealing, sexual misconduct, lying, and using alcohol and drugs which cause negligence.
an9.63:4.4: These are the five weaknesses when you’re training.
an9.63:5.1: To give up these five weaknesses in your training you should develop the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
an9.63:5.3: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
an9.63:5.4: They meditate by observing an aspect of feelings …
an9.63:5.5: They meditate by observing an aspect of the mind …
an9.63:5.6: They meditate by observing an aspect of principles, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
an9.63:5.7: To give up those five weaknesses in your training you should develop these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
